taskDescription:
Identify a 1 {a_1} and d d for the following arithmetic sequence. Use this information to determine the 86 th 86\text{th} term.

{ 4.5 , 8.1 , 11.7 , 15.3 , 18.9 , 22.5 , 26.1 , . . . } \left\{ {4.5,8.1,11.7,15.3,18.9,22.5,26.1,...} \right\}
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>4.5</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} = 4.5</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>d</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>3.6</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">d = 3.6</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mn>36</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>310.5</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_{36}} = 310.5</annotation></semantics></math>
